pkgmetadata.longdescription: 请注意最新版本3.1.2.2023.6.19.16.57.42支持2.6, 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.12但我们不确定依赖库是否存在。请使用以上版本的谨慎安装Please noteThe latest version 3.1.2.2023.6.19.16.57.42 supports 2.6, 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.12But we are not sure if the dependent library exists.Please use the above version for careful installation
